devdoc.details: Accumulated yield template implementation, providing yield distribution based on token holdings

ShareTokenTransferred(address,address,ui.details: Token transfer event (for tracking transfers that affect yield)

calculateAccumulatedShares(address,uint2.details: Calculate user's accumulated shares at specified balance

distributeDividend(uint256,bytes).details: Distribute dividend to global pool, only dividend treasury can call

params._initData: Encoded initialization data (contains token and original initData)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

totalAccumulatedShares().details: Query global pool total accumulated shares

totalDividend().details: Query global pool total dividend amount

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateUserPoolsOnTransfer(address,addres.details: Update user pools on token transfer (core functionality)

devdoc.title: AccumulatedYield

userdoc.notice: Supports accumulated yield and real-time claiming, similar to MasterChef design
